casebody.data:
Casey Leigh RUTTER
v.
Adam JANIS et al. Nancy Beale, Administratrix (Estate of Lindsey Beale)
v.
Luis Martins et al. Jason Ferreira
v.
Luis Martins et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 6, 2018

The plaintiffs' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 180 Conn.App. 1, 182 A.3d 85 (2018), is granted, limited to the following issue:

"Did the Appellate Court correctly conclude, under the circumstances of this case, that the thirty day loan period of General Statutes § 14-60 did not, as a matter of law, include the first day of the loan period?"

KAHN and ECKER, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
